content:
# The insertion of 10 iron ore into the furnace has failed again, as the inventory does not reflect any changes. This indicates that the furnace is not receiving the iron ore.
# 
# Since I have previously gathered iron ore, it seems that the furnace is not able to accept the iron ore from my inventory. I will need to check the furnace's status and inventory again to understand why the insertion is not working.

# Checking the furnace inventory and status once more.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Checking the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the entities on the map related to the furnace.
